verbs.description: root stew while [V: inventing] [ARG1: a new form of comfort food i made a stew of carrots turnips parsnips and rutabaga] [ARGM-TMP: when i 'm in the mood to change things up] i add potatoes or chicken —maria davis flower mound texas peel
